sentence: The image is a collage of Pepsi advertisements, featuring both posters and outdoor displays.
sentence_cn: 该图片是百事可乐广告的拼贴画，包括海报和户外展示。

sentence: - Background: Vibrant mix of blue, pink, and purple with snowflake designs.
sentence_cn: - 背景：蓝色、粉色和紫色的鲜艳混合，带有雪花图案。

sentence: - Text: "NEW LOOK SAME OOMPH" in large, bold white letters.
sentence_cn: - 文字：“NEW LOOK SAME OOMPH”，采用大号粗体白色字母。

sentence: The 'O's are replaced with Pepsi logos.
- Bottom Text: "REFRESH YOUR WORLD" is written below the main text.
sentence_cn: - 底部文字：正文下方写着“REFRESH YOUR WORLD”。

sentence: - Visual: A can of Pepsi on the right side.
sentence_cn: - 视觉：右侧有一罐百事可乐。

sentence: - First: Orange background with the text "NEW REUNION SAME JOY" in white, featuring a Pepsi can.
sentence_cn: - 第一：橙色背景，上面有白色文字“NEW REUNION SAME JOY”，还有百事可乐罐子。

sentence: - Second: Purple background, "SHAKE YOUR 2010" in white, with the 'O' incorporating the Pepsi logo.
sentence_cn: - 第二：紫色背景，白色“SHAKE YOUR 2010”，其中的“O”包含百事可乐的标志。

sentence: - Third: Purple background, "SPLASH INTO THE NEW YEAR" beside an image of a glass filled with Pepsi and ice, including the Pepsi logo.
sentence_cn: - 第三：紫色背景，“欢庆新年”字样，旁边是一杯装满百事可乐和冰块的玻璃杯的图像，包括百事可乐的标志。

sentence: - Left Display: Shows an illuminated advertisement similar to the left poster, visible at night on a street.
sentence_cn: - 左侧显示：显示类似于左侧海报的发光广告，在夜间街道上可见。

sentence: - Right Display: Daytime view at a bus stop or outdoor area, with the same "NEW LOOK SAME OOMPH" design as the left poster.
sentence_cn: - 右侧展示：公交车站或室外区域的白天视图，采用与左侧海报相同的“NEW LOOK SAME OOMPH”设计。

sentence: The images are collectively highlighting Pepsi's new look while maintaining the same taste, with festive, energetic designs suitable for the holiday or New Year period.
sentence_cn: 这些图片共同凸显了百事可乐在保持同样口味的同时的新面貌，其喜庆、充满活力的设计适合假期或新年期间。
